answers.answer: Really not a lot except what you are already doing. As long as you are not having issues with your blood pressure. Report any headaces, blurred vision or epigenetic pain to your Dr.
That was meant to be epigastric. pain...
If your face is puffy too, I'd run to the drug store and get your bp checked just to be sure you don't need to head to the hospital.
Its probably a good idea to call your doc to be checked for preeclampsia...

question: I am almost 37 weeks.  And everything is swollen my hands my feet and my face is puffy. I've tried to elevate my feet to see if it would go down and nothing.  What can I do? ??
title: Swelling
